output: For each position of the array N, print "N[i] = x", where i is the array position and x is the number stored in that position.
input: The input contains an integer number T (2 ≤ T ≤ 50).
name: Array Fill II
description: Write a program that reads a number T and fill a vector N[1000] with the numbers from 0 to T-1 repeated times, like as the example below.
